meanings.sent1: The sugariest candy in the store was a lollipop.
meanings.sent2: The cake was too sweet because it was the sugariest dessert I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: The sugariest drink made my teeth ache from the sweetness.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sugary as the sugariest treat.
meanings.sent5: The sugariest donut was covered in colorful sprinkles.

meanings.sent1: The sugariest cereal was the kids' favorite breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The sugariest cereal on the market is not always the healthiest choice.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the sugariest cereal should come with a warning label.
meanings.sent4: The sugariest ice cream flavor melted quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The sugariest soda made her hyper after just one sip.
